name: go-signature-statusbar
description: Display the signature of the current Go function under cursor in the status bar

format.description: Format of the signature in the status bar, where %F is the name of the function, %A its argument(s) and %R the returned type(s)

readme:
# go-signature-statusbar package

Display the signature of the current Go function under cursor in the status bar.

![go-signature-statusbar](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wndhydrnt/go-signature-statusbar/master/go-signature-statusbar.gif)
